Why spend time on the inferior?
color_lens
Beginners Workshop (25-26 Nov)
Recently started Wujiquan and wish to get in-depth instruction from the Master himself? Master Yu Qingdi will be in Beijing to provide a 2 day workshop.
flash_on
Advanced Workshop (25-26 Nov)
Have you been training in Wujiquan for at least a year and wish to experience some rapid advancement? With personal instruction from Master Yu Qingdi and training with other experienced peers, you will gain a lot of insights. Do not miss this opportunity!
